channel.title: Help im a noob
channel.description:
how do i add spec bars to weps?
ive found loads of tuts about how 2 add specs to weps that alredi have the bar so how do i make weps have a spec bar?

item.title: Help im a noob
item.dc:creator: @mrtube mrtube
item.description:
@mrtube wrote:

how would i make it so when u spec it lowers the spec bar ( changes the quest this is what i have atm for specs… )

public void specials() { // real working specs by Mod Adam if(!inSafezone()) { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) { if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0) if (specBar >= 50) { setAnimation(1658); attackPlayersWithin(341, misc.random(playerMaxHit), 1); hitDiff = 24; inCombat(); actionTimer = 25; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; specialRestoreTimer = 50; specBar -= 50; // Specs - by Mod Adam specglow = false; } else { sendMessage("You need more special energy to do that."); // Specs } } } }

[code]public void SpecialsProcess() { // real working specs by Mod Adam
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 /Whip/ ) {
specbar(12323);
}

if (specBar >= 100)
{
frame230(0, 12325, 0, 0);//beginning
frame230(0, 12326, 0, 0);//2nd part
frame230(0, 12327, 0, 0);//3rd part
frame230(0, 12328, 0, 0);//4th part
frame230(0, 12329, 0, 0);//middle
frame230(0, 12330, 0, 0);//4 from end
frame230(0, 12331, 0, 0);//3 from end
frame230(0, 12332, 0, 0);//2 from end
frame230(0, 12333, 0, 0);//1 from end
frame230(0, 12334, 0, 0);//end
}
if (specBar == 50)
{
frame230(0, 12328, 0, 0);//4th part
frame230(0, 12329, 0, 0);//middle
frame230(0, 12330, 0, 0);//4 from end
}
if (specBar == 0)
{
specbar(12325);
}

}
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Help im a noob
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

declare this anywhere in client.java

public void CheckBar() { if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####) sendQuest("S P E C I A L A T T A C K", 7586); }
change #### to the weapon id you want
note: this will not make the special work, just make the bar appear, and post if you need more help

Read full topic
